str2: In like manner, similarly, in the same way, equally. Adverb from homoios; similarly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Teaching, doctrine, what is taught. From didasko; instruction.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Nicolaitan, possibly a follower of Nicolaus (a heretic at Ephesus). From Nikolaos; a Nicolaite, i.e. Adherent of Nicolaus.
